short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know your Myntra orders and much more for last year

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅✅ NEW RELEASE: YOUR PERSONALIZED MYNTRA WRAP IS HERE!

Are you a fan of year-end summaries and personalized insights? Our latest Chrome extension transforms your Myntra shopping experience by providing a detailed wrap-up of your fashion journey. Dive into a rich dashboard directly on myntra.com and uncover a variety of insights:

Total Spend Tracker: Keep an eye on your yearly spending with a sleek. Monitor your fashion investment at a glance!

Top 5 Brands: Discover your most preferred brands on Myntra. Which brands top your list this year?

Monthly Expenditure Breakdown: Visualize your monthly spending habits. Are you a festive season splurger or a steady shopper?
